#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pin(n) printf("%d\n",n)
typedef long long LL;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char s[100005];
    while(scanf("%s",s)!=EOF)
    {
        int ct=0;
        int l=strlen(s); //cout<<l<<endl;
        int i=0,j=0;
        char temp;
        while(i<l)
        {
            ct=0;
            temp=s[i];
            while(s[i]==s[j] && i<l )
                ct++,j++;
            if(ct>3) { cout<<ct<<"!"<<temp;i=j;}
            else if(ct==3) {cout<<temp<<temp<<temp; i+=3;}
            else if(ct==2) {cout<<temp<<temp; i+=2;}
            else if(ct==1) {cout<<temp; i++;}
            j=i;
        }
        cout<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
